name: Battling Madness
description:
Made for the LD43 game jam by Sam(Sykoo) and  Noa(Blackthornprod) ! 

The theme was : sacrifices must be made !

You can RATE the game here : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/battling-madness
